templates.template:
Device Window can be open, closed Device Heater can be on, off, error
Rule "rule1" when Window.open then fire(Heater.off)
Rule 'rule2' when Heater.on then fire(Window.closed)
Rule 'rule3' when Window.closed then fire(Heater.on)
Rule 'rule4' when Window.closed then fire(Window.closed)
